original_text: And they were astonished at his teaching, for he taught them as one who had authority, and not as the scribes.
korean_text: 뭇 사람이 그의 교훈에 놀라니 이는 그가 가르치시는 것이 권위 있는 자와 같고 서기관들과 같지 아니함일러라

sentences.original_text: And they were astonished at his teaching,
for he taught them as one who had authority,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 권위 있는 자처럼 가르쳤고,
